name: lifecurrents-monorepo
description: LifeCurrents - A unified monorepo for frontend and worker

scripts.dev:all: concurrently --names "FRONTEND,WORKER" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgCyan.bold" "cd packages/frontend && npm run dev" "cd packages/worker && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd packages/frontend && npm run build && cd ../.. && cd packages/worker && npm run deploy
scripts.db:push: cd supabase && npx supabase db push
scripts.db:pull: cd supabase && npx supabase db pull
scripts.db:deploy: npm run db:push && npm run db:types
